stories.text:
currently coding up a new personal website to be focused on my blog and just personal website.

Currently using next.js and mdx for blog stuff and so on.

But it does not look great.

How can I make this website better in terms of design?
stories.title: Help: How can I make a nicely design website?

stories.text:
We run a fleet of high-performance desktop PCs for our continuous integration pipeline. They are bare-bones and do not have ECC RAM.

The statistics on system lockups/coredumps has been trending up, somewhat correlating with solar activity. They are not correlating with anything in the local environment such as power or cooling.

Of course when a system halts we just power cycle it and get on with our work, but the coincidence remains.

https://www.swpc.noaa.gov/products/solar-cycle-progression
stories.title: Are sunspots/coronal mass ejections affecting your systems?
